spell.name: Magic Shield
entries: You touch a nonmagical shield. Until the spell ends, that shield becomes magic, giving an additional +1 bonus to armor class.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

spell.name: Homeward

components.m: an object that reminds the caster of home or safety

entries: Wrapped in feelings of comforting nostalgia, you wish to return to your place of belonging. You are transported to the place you think of most as home. If this place is on another plane or your sense of home is unfocused, you are instead transported to the last place on your current plane where you felt safe and warm.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

spell.name: Hidden Weapon
entries: A weapon you touch becomes hidden from detection by others. For the duration, the weapon is {@condition invisible} and cannot be heard.
Attack rolls with this weapon against a creature that cannot see, otherwise sense, or have discerned the nature of the weapon are made with advantage.

A creature that sees an attack made with this weapon may use its reaction or action to examine the weapon and can determine the nature of the illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) or Wisdom (Perception) check against your spell save DC.

spell.name: Magic Barrier
entries: You ward yourself against magical attack. Until the spell ends, you have resistance to the damage from spells.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you also have immunity to the damage from spells cast at 1st level or lower. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, you have immunity to the damage from spells of one level higher for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Dead Again
entries: You bless up to three corpses of creatures of your choice within range, transforming them into magical bombs. Each corpse must be of a creature that was larger than Tiny and that died within the last 10 days.

Each creature within 10 feet of one of these corpses must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 5d6} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a creature is within 10 feet of more than one of these corpses when you cast this spell, the damage is increased by {@dice 2d6} for every additional blessed corpse.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional corpse for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Divine Pillars of Light
entries: You conjure the destructive light of the angels. Each creature you choose within 30 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 10d6} radiant damage. A creature that succeeds on its saving throw takes half as much damage. While you are concentrating on this spell, your speed becomes 0. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to conjure destructive light in this way again.

spell.name: Floating Chaos
entries: You create a floating orb of primordial fire within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a ranged spell attack against a creature within 60 feet of the orb. On a hit, the target takes fire damage equal to {@dice 3d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
As a bonus action on your turn, you can repeat the attack against a creature within 60 feet of it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Chameleon
entries: You assume the guise of an innocuous object. When you cast this spell, your appearance transforms into that of a still object that would not seem out of place in your current environment. If you move while disguised, your form moves with you as though pulled along and does not change the noise of your movements.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to become a tall pole, objects pass through the pole above your head, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing or would feel your head and hair. If you use this spell to appear thinner than you are, the hand of someone who reaches out to touch you would bump into you while it was seemingly still in midair.
To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use its action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC.
The spell ends early if you make an attack, cast a spell, take damage, move more than 10 feet in a round, or end it with a bonus action.

spell.name: Spook
entries: You grant yourself the stealth and poise of a silent predator. Until the spell ends, your movements do not produce noise and you do not take falling damage from falls of 60 feet or less.

spell.name: Yearn
entries: You create an orb of comforting warmth within range. Each creature within 30 feet of the orb with less than 7 Intelligence must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature must spend all their movement moving toward the orb and cannot look away from it. Creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} are immune to this effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a creature can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on that creature.
